creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
description: dancing figure looking down, wearing a horned animal skin over his head like a hooded cape; figure wears bells on straps around his knees and holds a rattle in his PL hand and an unidentified arcing object in his PR hand; slightly stylized; attached to two-tiered wooden base
dimension:
16 7/8 × 10 1/4 × 6 3/4 in. (42.86 × 26.04 × 17.15 cm) (approx., without base)
4 × 10 × 12 7/8 in. (10.16 × 25.4 × 32.7 cm) (object part, approx., base only)
marks: Signature, Date and Edition on front at bottom edge, incised: [NARANJO / (c) 1
title: Deer Dancer
